attributes.title: Annoying Orange
attributes.review: I downloaded the app hoping to get news and updates on our great President Trump. But when I opened it it was just a bunch of reboots and old clips from that 2010 trend annoying orange. I don’t understand and I’m offended that people would compare President Trump to an the annoying orange.  Our Orange man is hilarious nowhere near annoying.

attributes.title: Trump never again
attributes.review:
I’m very proud of all you’ve done💖✨🕺🏻🧚🏻‍♀️ oh... I was talking to Obama☄️🧚🏼🏆💞👄

The second my finger touched download I started to transform into a orange🍊saggy🤏 good for nothing❌ Cheeto👁👄👁. Luckily 2 hours after I uninstalled I went back to normal. This was a horrible experience and I hope this is helpful so no one else has to endure what I have endured😿.

attributes.title: So umm no
attributes.review:
I just wanna day that I downloaded an app because I was hungry and really wanted to order from Taco Bell but my phone did an oopsie and this app downloaded. 
First off there are no tacos on here which disappoints me, because apparently this peach has something against the Chinese or something
Second there weren’t delivering sour cream for my tacos
Third I just wanted my taco
And fourth of all, this app made my crops shrivel, my health decline, and my depression the same because it has always been that bad but still
I will never order from this place again -18/10 no tacos here 👁👄👁

attributes.title: just DISGUSTING
attributes.review: honestly, this app fully disgusts me and it doesn’t even work! ugh, the fact that i had to try and open the app 420 times and it STILL didn’t let me in was just... no. i am a 69 year old lady, just trying to see what disgusting words this cheeto wanted to say. oh well, i don’t care about mr. cheeto anyways... it’s all about takis ✨

attributes.title: THIS APP BROKE MY FRIDGE!
attributes.review: this may sound crazy but it isnt. like what the heck! this app doesn’t update you. one day i was sitting on my couch and then i go make food. i set my phone down and my fridge literally exploded! the pieces flew everywhere! a tiny shard went into my eye! and i had to get rushed to the ER. my phone get overheated with this app too. please remove this. 😡

attributes.title: This app is trash🤮
attributes.review: I opened this app and it started making my eyes burn, I can’t even Describe what I saw. I saw the most disturbing thing I could ever see, I saw a disgusting pig covered is Cheeto dust saying pure nonsense. I hope our president could stop this, OH WAIT....... That’s the president, not mine where is the Obama app?? Trump is a racist and a rapist I hope we can finish him together.✊🏿✊🏾✊🏽✊🏼✊🏻 BLM.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE WASTE OF MY TIME
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to connect with tiers that share my political stance however the entire app is based on bringing down others, weather it be the other political party, nonwhite people, etc.. I don’t understand how such a hateful app exists, AND THR FACT THAT ITS THE PRESIDENTS. Come on apple we can do better then this delete this waste or space

attributes.title: SO VERY NASTY AND CANCEROUS
attributes.review: i will keep this review short and concise. upon downloading this app, it sent a virus into my mobile device and sent my grandmother a egregious zoomed in photo of a half healed scab on the inside of a person thigh (i suspect it to be the current president’s thigh seeing as the skin was a concerning orange hue). my grandmother wept and wept (understandably) at the mere glimpse of this photo. please do not download this app.

attributes.title: Disgusted 👁 👄 👁
attributes.review: The amount of of disappointment I feel from this app is ASTRONOMICAL I hope it never is put up for download again. May other viewers beware of the ABSOLUTE disgust of this bunker Cheeto boy😢 as an American this is a DISGRACE 😔I’d rate 0 stars if I could! 100% do not recommend whatsoever unless you are looking for an early funeral because of the sight you will witness🤢

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: bruh i downloaded this app and it stole all my icecream, like what am i supposed to eat now? i was very disturbed to see pictures of a strange looking orange running for president. like is this a joke to you?? presidency is a serious thing 🙄 in other words this app is 🗑 and needs to be ✨cancelled✨ faster than chase hudson can say the n word. 🐔🎂🤩🌧🧮
